Detail: ADC_ID is a set of bit flags
Fault type includes which TC failed, MAX31856_fault is directly from sensor board

Message description: Cathode heater safety TC won't connect

Detail: HIH6120ID+fault identifies which HIH6120 is faulty, last 2 bits identify error
PressureID+fault identifies which pressure sensor is faulty, last 2 bits identify error
Temperature_ID identifies which reading is out of bounds, over/under details if it is over or under
